summary: Major UI overhaul with patch notes, improved navigation, and better mobile experience.
new: Patch notes viewer shows what's new in each version, accessible from the popup
Back button navigation makes it easy to return from patch notes to the main popup
Improved touch targets on mobile for better button and icon interactions
Consistent page headers across options and popup views for a unified look
fixes: Action buttons now appear side-by-side instead of stacked for better use of space
Popup layout and overflow handling works correctly on Android devices
Icon components unified with consistent styling and variant support
Settings loading logic streamlined to prevent unnecessary re-renders
